ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting

Class Stamp

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.PGraphicsDelegate
      • vialab.SMT.Zone
        • ca.uwaterloo.epad.ui.MoveableItem
          • ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting.Brush
            • ca.uwaterloo.epad.painting.Stamp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener, processing.core.PConstants

    public class Stamp
extends Brush
    This class represents a Stamp widget that paints a certain shape on the screen. It has a single parameter stampFile which represents the path to the shape file (a vector image with the extension svg).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dmitry Pyryeskin
    See Also:
    Brush, MoveableItem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String stampFile
      The path to the shape file.
      This parameter can be retrieved automatically from XML files using SimpleMarshaller class.

      • renderStroke

        public void renderStroke(Stroke s,
                int colour,
                processing.core.PGraphics g)
        Pencil renders strokes by drawing the specified shape in the initial point of the stroke. Other points are ignored, so that only a single shape is drawn per stroke.
        Specified by:
        renderStroke in class Brush
        Parameters:
        s - Stroke object
        colour - colour of the stroke
        g - PGraphics object to render the stroke into
